description: Returns a list of deployment jobs for a fleet. You can optionally provide filters to retrieve specific deployment jobs.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filters to limit results. The filter names status and fleetName are supported. When filtering, you must use the complete value of the filtered item. You can use up to three filters, but they must be for the same named item. For example, if you are looking for items with the status InProgress or the status Pending. (dict) --- Information about a filter. name (string) --- The name of the filter. values (list) --- A list of values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: deploymentJobs
nested_items.description: A list of deployment jobs that meet the criteria of the request.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the deployment job.

nested_items.name: fleet
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment job.

nested_items.name: deploymentApplicationConfigs
nested_items.description: The deployment application configuration.

nested_items.name: application
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the robot application.

nested_items.name: applicationVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the application.

nested_items.name: launchConfig
nested_items.description: The launch configuration.

nested_items.name: packageName
nested_items.description: The package name.

nested_items.name: preLaunchFile
nested_items.description: The deployment pre-launch file. This file will be executed prior to the launch file.

nested_items.name: launchFile
nested_items.description: The launch file name.

nested_items.name: postLaunchFile
nested_items.description: The deployment post-launch file. This file will be executed after the launch file.

nested_items.name: environmentVariables
nested_items.description: An array of key/value pairs specifying environment variables for the robot application.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: deploymentConfig
nested_items.description: The deployment configuration.

nested_items.name: concurrentDeploymentPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of robots receiving the deployment at the same time.

nested_items.name: failureThresholdPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of deployments that need to fail before stopping deployment.

nested_items.name: robotDeploymentTimeoutInSeconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for deployment to a single robot to complete. Choose a time between 1 minute and 7 days. The default is 5 hours.

nested_items.name: downloadConditionFile
nested_items.description: The download condition file.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The bucket containing the object.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the object.

nested_items.name: etag
nested_items.description: The etag of the object.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: A short description of the reason why the deployment job failed.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The deployment job failure code.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the deployment job was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous paginated request did not return all of the remaining results, the response object's nextToken parameter value is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListDeploymentJobs again and assign that token to the request object's nextToken parameter. If there are no remaining results, the previous response object's NextToken parameter is set to null.
